product_name: Salomon Z12 B100 Downhill Ski Bindings
long_description: Salomon Z12 B100 downhill ski bindings offer advanced skiers a performance connection to their skis. The Z12 B100 bindings precisely transmit your motions to the skis by maximizing lateral pressure. Long, automatically adjusting toe wings increase contact zone with boot for precise boot hold and enhanced energy transmission to edges. Specially designed pedal adds rigidity to improve performance. Pivoting design controls release during backward falls. 4 - 12 DIN range accommodates a wide range of skier sizes and abilities. 100mm brake width fits most all-mountain wide skis and some powder skis.
short_description: Salomon Z12 B100 downhill ski bindings offer advanced skiers a performance connection to their skis.
